title: Rebekah Vardy praises husband Jamie's 'faith, trust and loyalty' after showdown with Coleen
text:

Rebekah Vardy has made a gushing post about her husband Jamie, praising him for being "loyal".

The socialite, 37, has had a difficult time of late after getting caught up in the WAGatha Christie scandal with Coleen Rooney, who accused her of selling stories about her.

But it seems Becky has got her footballer other half, 32, fully on her side, if her Instagram stories are anything to go by.

She reposted a picture of a soppy love quote and tagged Jamie's own Instagram account, telling him that she loved him.

The quote said: "True love requires faith, trust and loyalty. Not chocolate, flowers and expensive gifts. Soulmate."

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Rebekah Vardy/Instagram)

Becky wrote: "Love this. @Vardy7 I love you xxx"

She's also been enjoying some family time as she shared a photo of three of her children toasting marshmallows on a fire.

The mum-of-five could be seen dishing out the snacks as Finley, nine, Sophia, five, and Taylor, two, gathered around her.

She captioned the post: "Hot Chocolate & Toasted Marshmallow kind of day #minibonfire."

(Image: Rebekah Vardy/Instagram)

(Image: Twitter)

Wayne Rooney 's wife accused Rebekah's Instagram account of leaking stories to a British tabloid, before going totally radio silent online.

The nation watched in shock as Coleen exposed Rebekah's account and told her followers how she became suspicious of the fellow WAG and pinpointed the guilty account.

The saga began when Coleen made the revelation that someone close to her had been betraying her for years.

(Image: Getty Images)

She became suspicious when stories, that only her select followers could know about, were getting into the press.

Coleen explained how she blocked all users apart from Vardy's account from seeing her social media stories, then purposely posted false information to see if it ended up in the press. The WAG then exposed Vardy's account as the culprit.

Vardy, who is pregnant with her fifth child, has vehemently denied all allegations and hired a cyber security expert to clear her name.
description: Becky, 37, reposted a picture of a soppy love quote and tagged Jamie's Instagram account telling him that she loved him
